title: Asking for a prayer for Jimmy Quinn's grandfather after the departure-related attack?
subtitle: According to a mysterious Facebook rumor, the grandson of a man named Jimmy Quinn was assaulted at school for refusing to participate in post-gun departures.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: "Jimmy Quinn's grandson" was attacked for refusing to participate in marches in March 2018 to protest that no action had been taken by legislators regarding the shooting of schools.
